issue.title: Orientation does not work in topic /ihmc_ros/valkyrie/control/hand_trajectory

content.html:
@nkoenig

Hi Nathan, just a quick question. I am trying to use the hand trajectory controller, but I am struggling with the position feedback. Thanks a lot! We are a little stuck on this one.
